channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Remedial work inadequate., 1st August
item.description:
Previous complaint ref 7893203. Work was carried out yesterday 31/07/25. The lampost is still obscured by yew foliage and still casts a deep shadow across the pavement. The contractor did not appear to be aware of the objective.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hartley Close, Bickley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Two double mattresses plus assorted mayerails, 1st August
item.description:
Two mattresses have now been dumped outside John Donne Primary school on Woods Road. A load of other materials have also been dumped out the front of Kendrick Court, two doors down the road. I believe these are from the same source.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wood's Road, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Building material on pavement between 34 - 36 Barry Avenue, 1st August
item.description:
There is building material blocking the pavement between 34 - 36 Barry Avenue. Please can this be looked into with a matter of urgency as people can not get by.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Barry Avenue, West Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside 12 Kelly St NW1 8PH, 1st August
item.description:
The new tree was leaning over into the street as the pole had moved and the hessian tie had gone slack. We have tightened the hessian but the pole is too small and weak, and any decent wind may cause it to fall over again. It needs a stronger and longer pole (or two). It took 2 years to get the old tree removed and this new one planted and we don't want to lose it. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 14, Kelly Street, Kentish Town, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Huge pothole, 1st August
item.description:
Pothole been getting worse over the past year, now quite deep and will probably cause damage to cars.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 18, Hill Crest, Blackfen, Sidcup, London

item.title: Poor or non existent street cleaning, 1st August
item.description:
Although the top end of grierson road was littered with picked earlier in the wk towards the station, most if it, from Maclean road wasn’t and there is rubbish in the street and road which has been there for weeks. Please can someone clean our v busy street.
